A '''screenshot''', '''screen capture''', or '''screen dump''' is an [[image]] taken by the [[computer]] to record the visible items displayed on the [[Computer display|monitor]] or another visual output device. Usually this is a digital image taken by the host operating system or software running on the computer device, but it can also be a capture made by a [[camera]] or a device intercepting the video output of the computer.
A '''screenshot''', '''screen capture''', or '''screen dump''' is an [[image]] taken by the [[computer]] to record the visible items displayed on the [[Computer display|monitor]] or another visual output device. Usually this is a digital image taken by the host operating system or software running on the computer device, but it can also be a capture made by a [[camera]] or a device intercepting the video output of the computer.
